content: **additional materials ** - 3 hairpin lace loom **gauge notes ** measure loops on both sides of the strip the strips will stretch lengthwise when worn design shown as illustration/example for article in *vogue knitting fall 2007* on hairpin lace but pattern not published in this issue pattern directions only available online **from pattern notes ** see the technical article on page 38 of the fall 2007 issue of *vogue knitting* for in-depth help with this pattern or visit www stitchdiva com/tutorials aspx 1 for free in-depth instruction on hairpin lace 1 http //www stitchdiva com/tutorials aspx
